title: Strengthening Elementary Mathematics Practical Competencies through Online Collaborative Learning

context.prior_knowledge: Advanced theoretical knowledge and mastery of high-level application skills
context.additional_context: Instructional design competency enhancement program for professionals in education/teaching/learning fields

learning_goals: Explain three or more mathematical problem-solving strategies through peer interaction in VR-based simulations
Improve mathematical concept explanations by exchanging collaborative feedback five or more times on an online discussion platform
Complete and present evaluations of one or more VR-developed mathematics teaching scenarios per team
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
